Billy G. Vanderpool, Phoenix
Democrat, has announced his
candidacy for the Arizona House
of Representatives. District 7.


Vanderpool, long active in
Maricopa County Democratic
politics. is presently the execu-
tive director of the Southside
Democratic Association and
chairman of the district party
group.


"My PLATFORM" stated Van
derpool, twill consist primarily
of a pledge to serve the greatest
good of the greatest number of
my constituents in this legisla-
tive district, without regard to
race, color, creed or economic
position. Secondly. but of equal
